document.full_text: a gang member who was linked to a 2004 murder by an elaborate tattoo on his chest that authorities say memorialized the crime scene was sentenced on thursday to 65 years to life in prison.
document.title: man linked to murder by tattoo sentenced to prison
lines_and_colors: a gang member who was linked to a 2004 murder by an elaborate tattoo on his chest that authorities say memorialized the crime scene was sentenced on thursday to 65 years to life in prison.
